Functions¶

somefun[source]

somefun(x)

x is a number, fool

somefun(4)

16
assert somefun(5) == 25

Classes¶

class Box[source]

Box(x)

A box for values

Box.say[source]

Box.say()

Apply somefun to x and print it out

b1 = Box(4)
b1.say()

16
